Title: Every time I make a small amount of money doing something (poker, charging limes, buying at 40c sell...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: Every time I make a small amount of money doing something (poker, charging limes, buying at 40c selling at 41c on Predictit, Amazon Affiliate Links, etc.) I think to myself: What if I did that twice as fast for 3 hours a day for the next 5 years.
